Ula kuy misuayaw tu Lanhe kuo mahida tu kuni kakelec nu hitay a tademaw sipaini i kitakit han u sakacacay. itini i sakalihaday nu sakaudip, malicad kunikasi laculan, tademaw nikasi laculan atu nuiputahay a nisiwbaay nikasi laculan, Ula kuy u saka tusa nisi niyaduay. ,GDP , . itini i hamin nu Mei cuo , Ula kuy (Uruguay a tademaw sakay celakan a sulitan, macunus ku GDP , nipatideng tu baluhay anikawawan atu nika tanektek aniptidengan tu luma' u sakatulu nikasi nganganan. . . , , , , . Ula kuy i kitakit han u angangan nu banuh nu sidi, tipus, lihum, pakulian a basis nu katalan, amikuo atu buling nu sakatahekal a kanatal. 2013 , . tusa a malebut cacay a bataan idaw ku tulu (2013) a mihcaan, misulitay tu sakaudip a tadamawan Ula kuy (Uruguay han u "kitakit nu mihcaan a kanatal", pakasi idaay tu tama nikasi laculan, pacakay atu taneng anikakapahan pacakayan. palutadenga tunika lecawa nu sakalecad a tademaw, mipesi tu wawa ibili han u kapahay a kawaw sa. , . sisa, Ula kuy hicasa i kitakit u sakalihalay atu mucelak nu siakay a kanatal, itini i nuudipan a cunlian, piliwkayan atu sapidiputaw itini i kitakit u sayaway tu. aydaay a likisi . . nikudan satu Ula kuy sawni malepacaw tu biyaw a kanatalan, yadah kuma pataya, tanuydaan a Ula kuy namakaydaay i O cuo (Europe katuud kunipi ala nuheni mihinangay a tademaw, sakay liwmah nu sapatahekal u Ula kuy nu angngan a sakaudip nu kawaw. . nikalepacawan tu sakatusa nu ayaw nu O cuo (Europe atu kitakit duma a kitidaan sawni idaw kuni kalepacawan, hatidaay nu nilaculan tu nikaliwmahan makayda i Ula kuy a tahekal, miida tu kaliwmahan nu sakaudip ku Ula kuy mala kalimucisang a kanatal. . . hedeksa tu sakatusa anikalpacawan, Ula kuy (Uruguay mitukuday tu mali a laylayan naw i kitakitay nu kaadihan, Ula kuy (Uruguay itini i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu tusa a bataan idaw ku sebat (1924) a mihcaan atu cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu tusa a bataan idaw ku walu (1928) a mihcaan nu tusaay a mihcaan nu Awyun pitukudan tu mali nikasedsedan makaala tu kimpay. 1930 1950 . 1970 2010 . Ula kuy (Uruguay makaala tu misataday nu kitakit amitukuday tu mala a kawaw nu kanatal, itini sayaway nu cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu tulu a bataan (1930) a mihcaan atu cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu lima a bataan (1950) a mihcaan kina tusa makaala tu kayngun. duma satu i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu pitu a bataan (1970) a mihcaan atu tusa a malebut cacay a bataan (2010) a mihcaan kina tusa makaala tu tian cun . malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan CIA List of current heads of state and government :https: zh.wikipedia.org wiki E4 B9 8C E6 8B 89 E5 9C AD
